channel.title: Need good sql server to link php
channel.description:
i am planning to make a whole website linked on a sql server so it would be possible to make shops on the site and buying stuff without playing online, a heighscore system to and when i am done i will make it public but i need some1 who has/or can code a good sql server
tell me sells
